snippet: Continuing to impress on clay ahead of the French Open, Andy Murray defeated Rafael Nadal 7-5, 6-4 to reach his second straight Madrid Open final on Saturday....
lead_paragraph: Continuing to impress on clay ahead of the French Open, Andy Murray defeated Rafael Nadal 7-5, 6-4 to reach his second straight Madrid Open final on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Murray Beats Nadal, Will Meet Djokovic in Madrid Final
headline.main: Murray Beats Nadal, Will Meet Djokovic in Madrid Final
